com.github.wuic.engine.core

Class EngineRequestTransformer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.wuic.util.Pipe.DefaultTransformer<ConvertibleNut>
      • com.github.wuic.engine.core.EngineRequestTransformer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Pipe.Transformer<ConvertibleNut>

    public class EngineRequestTransformer
extends Pipe.DefaultTransformer<ConvertibleNut>

    This Pipe.Transformer handles ConvertibleNut transformation and perform it by delegating the job to a EngineRequestTransformer.RequireEngineRequestTransformer. The delegated transform method will expect the usual parameters with an additional EngineRequest, which is wrapped by this class.

    Since:
    0.5.1
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Guillaume DROUET

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  EngineRequestTransformer.RequireEngineRequestTransformer
      This interface is implemented by Pipe.Transformer which needs a EngineRequest to perform transformation.
